keywords: cocktails, craft cocktails, mezcal, coffee cocktails, carajillo
name: Piña Carajillo

recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker combine licor 43, mezcal, espresso, and pineapple gum syrup. Shake well until chilled; if you don’t have the syrup, you can substitute pineapple juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a old fashioned glass and enjoy.
